scripts.build: (mkdir dist 2> /dev/null || true) && ( rm -rf dist/.mesh 2> /dev/null || true) && mv .mesh/ dist && echo 'import { createServer } from "node:http"; import { createBuiltMeshHTTPHandler } from "./.mesh"; const server = createServer(createBuiltMeshHTTPHandler()); server.listen(80)' > dist/index.js
